name: Approval Timed Out
description: Sent to the approval requester and approvers when no resolution has been reached for an approval request since instantiation based on an admin-configured number of days.
subject: An Approval Request Has Exceeded The Allotted Time Limit
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

An approval request for $approvalName that was submitted #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '' && $requestee.identityID == $__recipient.id) on your behalf by $requester.name #elseif($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '') by $requestee.name #elseif($requester.identityID == $__recipient.id) by you #else by $requester.name #end has timed out after failing to reach a resolution after $timeoutDays days and is now closed.

#if($requestee.identityID == $__recipient.id || $requester.identityID == $__recipient.id) To review your approval requests or to create a new one, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$requesterPath #else To review approval requests that are assigned to you, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$approverPath #end


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
